::KitKat/DarkMouse::

KitKat:;
She looked up ato see Megatron take his tail and touch her shoulders 
instead of hitting her.  She looked up at him and then stood up. She 
lowered her head out of respect. "Thank you Commander Megatron."  She 
then she looked at him."I shall bring you honor and glory 
Commander."  She turned and walked back tothe CR chambers hoping 
Drillbit was ok.  She saw Land mine crying and Drillbit trying to 
comfort her.  She walked over and looked at Drillbit, "What has 
happened?  Why is Land Mine crying so?"


DarkMouse::

She looked at the Tarantula and shuddered.  She stayed close to 
Quickstrike as she walked down the tunnel.  She stepped on one of the 
dead aliens in the dark "Squeek!"  She jumped and stumbled.  This 
place gave her the creeps.  

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, JP3884@a... wrote:
>     Megatron looked at the fembot bowing before him. It was a 
pathetic site 
> for such a talented warrior, but she was loyal. "Indeed, you have 
redeemed 
> yourself Kitkat. Such headstrong tactics are just what Im looking 
for! A 
> career as Sub-Commander would do you well, yes."
>     He took his tail gun, and instead of hitting her with it, 
knighted her. 
> It was a silly thing to do but the moment felt right.
> 
>     Tarantulas watched the two bots walk through the dark beneath 
him. He 
> knew Quickstrike, they had many a good time back in the old war. As 
for the 
> rodent, he didnt know. She must have gotten mixed up his clone. The 
bastard.
>     In his beast mode he slowly dropped, suspended from a cyberweb, 
and 
> dangled in front of them. "Aren't we punctual? Get into the 
Triangle room at 
> the end of the hall. Aracnia needs you two." He said and dropped to 
the floor.
>     He scurried forward, his eight optics shining forward like head 
beams 
> lighting the corridor scattered with the dead aliens.
